thread.section_title: Fireplace Remote Controls Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fireplace Remote Controls | fireplaceremotecontrols.com
thread.title: LARRY PEDERSON
thread.title_full: Fireplace Remote Controls reviewed by LARRY PEDERSON

author: LARRY PEDERSON
title: LARRY PEDERSON
text: Sales person informed me that either my remote receiver and/or remote control might need to be replaced. Individually they cost more than if purchased together. He said however if I bought the new receiver (mine was damaged). And found I also needed the remote later he would discount the remote to reflect the combo price. As it turned out I only needed the receiver. Part arrived in just a few days.
